attributes.action: Halal Meat must be declared on all food businesses
attributes.additional_details:
The sale of halal meat must be declared on all food businesses eg: fast food takeaway, menus etc when being sold so that the general public can make an informed decision on whether to purchase the product or to decide on a non halal meat product.
Action requested:
All menus - advertising food boards where applicable to show which products are halal meat and a sticker on all halal takeaways to be prominently shown to the general public upon entering the premises.
